languages.text: {n}Перед вами — Теодора фон Валанциус, и ее облик чудовищен: в груди зияет дыра, из-под кожи торчат ржавые крючья, а горло пересекает бугрящийся воспаленный шрам. Сама фигура мерцает, словно пропадая из этой реальности и снова в ней появляясь. Взглянув на вас белесыми глазами мертвеца, женщина ядовито улыбается.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}! Какая встреча! Я уже устала ждать, когда ты прибудешь с визитом". {n}"Теодора" смеривает вас взглядом, издевательский тон сменяется брезгливым.{/n} "Надо же, века беззаветного труда и стараний, и все, что я оставила после себя, перешло такому ничтожеству".

traits.locale_text: {n}Перед вами — Теодора фон Валанциус, и ее облик чудовищен: в груди зияет дыра, из-под кожи торчат ржавые крючья, а горло пересекает бугрящийся воспаленный шрам. Сама фигура мерцает, словно пропадая из этой реальности и снова в ней появляясь. Взглянув на вас белесыми глазами мертвеца, женщина ядовито улыбается.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}! Какая встреча! Я уже устала ждать, когда ты прибудешь с визитом". {n}"Теодора" смеривает вас взглядом, издевательский тон сменяется брезгливым.{/n} "Надо же, века беззаветного труда и стараний, и все, что я оставила после себя, перешло такому ничтожеству".

languages.text: {n}Theodora von Valancius is before you, and she looks grotesque: a hole yawns wide in her chest, rusted hooks protrude from beneath her skin, and a lumpen, inflamed scar cuts across her throat. The figure flickers, as though it is dropping in and out of this reality. She looks at you with the whitish eyes of a corpse and smiles venomously.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}! We meet at last! I had grown tired of waiting for you to pay me a visit." {n}"Theodora's" look is appraising, and her mocking tone turns to one of distaste.{/n} "Indeed, centuries of selfless toil and effort, and everything I left behind has gone to this nonentity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora von Valancius is before you, and she looks grotesque: a hole yawns wide in her chest, rusted hooks protrude from beneath her skin, and a lumpen, inflamed scar cuts across her throat. The figure flickers, as though it is dropping in and out of this reality. She looks at you with the whitish eyes of a corpse and smiles venomously.{/n} "Rogue Trader! We meet at last! I had grown tired of waiting for you to pay me a visit." {n}"Theodora's" gaze is appraising, and her mocking tone turns to one of distaste.{/n} "Indeed, centuries of selfless toil and effort, and everything I left behind has gone to this nonentity."

languages.text: {n}西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯就在你面前，她的样子看起来很诡异。她的胸口上有个大洞，皮肤下面隐隐露出了生锈的钩子，喉咙上的伤痕已经肿胀发炎。她的身影若隐若现，仿佛无法长时间停留在真实世界中。她用死人的白眼睛盯着你，脸上露出了恶毒的笑容。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}！我们终于见面了。我已经厌倦等待你来拜访我了。{n}“西奥多拉”的神态充满赞许之意，但她嘲弄的语气听起来充满厌恶。{/n}“是啊，几百年的无私拼搏与不断进取。我留下的所有遗产，现在都归这个无名小辈所有了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora von Valancius is before you, and she looks grotesque: a hole yawns wide in her chest, rusted hooks protrude from beneath her skin, and a lumpen, inflamed scar cuts across her throat. The figure flickers, as though it is dropping in and out of this reality. She looks at you with the whitish eyes of a corpse and smiles venomously.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}! We meet at last! I had grown tired of waiting for you to pay me a visit." {n}"Theodora's" look is appraising, and her mocking tone turns to one of distaste.{/n} "Indeed, centuries of selfless toil and effort, and everything I left behind has gone to this nonentity."

traits.locale_text: {n}西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯就在你面前，她的样子看起来很诡异。她的胸口上有个大洞，皮肤下面隐隐露出了生锈的钩子，喉咙上的伤痕已经肿胀发炎。她的身影若隐若现，仿佛无法长时间停留在现实世界中。她用死人的白眼睛盯着你，脸上露出了恶毒的笑容。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}！我们终于见面了。我已经厌倦等待你来拜访我了。{n}“西奥多拉”的神态充满赞许之意，但她嘲弄的语气听起来充满厌恶。{/n}“是啊，几百年的无私拼搏与不断进取。我留下的所有遗产，现在都归这个无名小辈所有了。”

languages.text: {n}Theodora von Valancius se encuentra frente a ti con una forma grotesca: un agujero se abre en su pecho, unos ganchos oxidados sobresalen de debajo de su piel y una cicatriz abultada e inflamada atraviesa su garganta. Su figura titila, como si no estuviera bien asentada en esta realidad. Te mira con los ojos blanquecinos de un cadáver y esboza una sonrisa venenosa.{/n} «¡{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}! ¡Por fin nos conocemos! Me he cansado de esperar tu visita». {n}La mirada analítica de «Theodora» te examina y su tono burlón pasa a ser de desagrado.{/n} «Efectivamente, después de siglos de esfuerzo y trabajo altruista, todo lo que tengo ha pasado a est{mf|e|a} mediocre».
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora von Valancius is before you, and she looks grotesque: a hole yawns wide in her chest, rusted hooks protrude from beneath her skin, and a lumpen, inflamed scar cuts across her throat. We meet at last! I had grown tired of waiting for you to pay me a visit." {n}"Theodora's" look is appraising, and her mocking tone turns to one of distaste.{/n} "Indeed, centuries of selfless toil and effort, and everything I left behind has gone to this nonentity."

Me he cansado de esperar tu visita». {n}La mirada analítica de «Theodora» te examina y su tono burlón pasa a ser de desagrado.{/n} «Efectivamente, después de siglos de esfuerzo y trabajo altruista, todo lo que tengo ha pasado a est{mf|e|a} mediocre».

languages.text: {n}テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはあなたの目の前にいる。その姿はグロテスクなものだった。胸には大きく穴が開き、皮膚の下からは錆びた鉤が突き出し、喉には炎症を起こした傷跡が刻まれている。その姿は、まるでこの現実を出たり入ったりしているかのように明滅している。彼女は死体のような白っぽい目であなたを見て、毒々しく微笑んだ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}！やっと会えた！あなたが訪ねてくるのを待ちくたびれたわ」{n}テオドラの眼差しはあなたを値踏みするよであり、その嘲るような口調は嫌悪を抱かせるものだった。{/n}「実に何世紀もの無私の労苦と努力、そして私が残したものはすべて、この取るに足らないもののせいでなくなってしまったのね」
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora von Valancius is before you, and she looks grotesque: a hole yawns wide in her chest, rusted hooks protrude from beneath her skin, and a lumpen, inflamed scar cuts across her throat. The figure flickers, as though it is dropping in and out of this reality. She looks at you with the whitish eyes of a corpse and smiles venomously.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}! We meet at last! I had grown tired of waiting for you to pay me a visit." {n}"Theodora's" look is appraising, and her mocking tone turns to one of distaste.{/n} "Indeed, centuries of selfless toil and effort, and everything I left behind has gone to this nonentity."

traits.locale_text: {n}テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスはあなたの目の前にいる。その姿はグロテスクなものだった。胸には大きく穴が開き、皮膚の下からは錆びた鉤が突き出し、喉には炎症を起こした傷跡が刻まれている。その姿は、まるでこの現実を出たり入ったりしているかのように明滅している。彼女は死体のような白っぽい目であなたを見て、毒々しく微笑んだ。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}！やっと会えた！あなたが訪ねてくるのを待ちくたびれたわ」{n}テオドラの眼差しはあなたを値踏みするよであり、その嘲るような口調は嫌悪を抱かせるものだった。{/n}「実に何世紀もの無私の労苦と努力、そして私が残したものはすべて、この取るに足らないもののせいでなくなってしまったのね」

languages.text: {n}Vor dir steht die grotesk entstellte Theodora von Valancius. In ihrer Brust klafft ein breites Loch, aus ihrer Haut ragen rostige Haken und ihre Kehle ziert eine hässliche, entzündete Narbe. Die Gestalt flackert, als wäre sie nicht fest in dieser Realität verankert. Sie betrachtet dich mit den weißlichen Augen einer Toten und lächelt gehässig.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}! Endlich treffen wir uns! Ich war es schon leid, zu warten, bis du mich besuchst." {n}"Theodoras" Blick ist abschätzig und der spöttische Klang ihrer Stimme weicht Verachtung.{/n} "Nun sind Jahrhunderte voller selbstloser Arbeit und alles, was ich hinterlassen habe, doch tatsächlich auf dieses Nichts übergegangen."
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora von Valancius is before you, and she looks grotesque: a hole yawns wide in her chest, rusted hooks protrude from beneath her skin, and a lumpen, inflamed scar cuts across her throat. The figure flickers, as though it is dropping in and out of this reality. She looks at you with the whitish eyes of a corpse and smiles venomously.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}! We meet at last! I had grown tired of waiting for you to pay me a visit." {n}"Theodora's" look is appraising, and her mocking tone turns to one of distaste.{/n} "Indeed, centuries of selfless toil and effort, and everything I left behind has gone to this nonentity."

Die Gestalt flackert, als wäre sie nicht fest in dieser Realität verankert. Sie betrachtet dich mit den weißlichen Augen einer Toten und lächelt gehässig.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}! Endlich treffen wir uns! Ich war es schon leid, zu warten, bis du mich besuchst." {n}"Theodoras" Blick ist abschätzig und der spöttische Klang ihrer Stimme weicht Verachtung.{/n} "Nun sind Jahrhunderte voller selbstloser Arbeit und alles, was ich hinterlassen habe, doch tatsächlich auf dieses Nichts übergegangen."

languages.text: {n}Théodora von Valancius se tient devant vous, du moins sa caricature grotesque et macabre. Une plaie béante suinte sur sa poitrine, des crochets rouillés dépassent çà et là de sa peau livide, et une vilaine cicatrice boursouflée lui barre la gorge d'une oreille à l'autre. Sa silhouette vacille, comme tiraillée entre deux plans de l'existence. Elle vous fixe de ses yeux morts et laiteux et vous adresse un sourire venimeux.{/n} « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g} ! Nous nous rencontrons enfin. Je commençais à me lasser d'attendre que vous vous décidiez à venir me rendre visite. » {n}Elle vous jauge du regard, et son ton moqueur cède la place au dégoût.{/n} « Des siècles de labeur acharné à me démener au service du bien commun, tout ça pour que le fruit de mon travail tombe entre les mains d'{mf|un|une} moins que rien. »
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora von Valancius is before you, and she looks grotesque: a hole yawns wide in her chest, rusted hooks protrude from beneath her skin, and a lumpen, inflamed scar cuts across her throat. The figure flickers, as though it is dropping in and out of this reality. She looks at you with the whitish eyes of a corpse and smiles venomously.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}! We meet at last! I had grown tired of waiting for you to pay me a visit." {n}"Theodora's" look is appraising, and her mocking tone turns to one of distaste.{/n} "Indeed, centuries of selfless toil and effort, and everything I left behind has gone to this nonentity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Théodora von Valancius se tient devant vous, du moins sa caricature grotesque et macabre. Une plaie béante suinte sur sa poitrine, des crochets rouillés dépassent çà et là de sa peau livide, et une vilaine cicatrice boursouflée lui barre la gorge d'une oreille à l'autre. Sa silhouette vacille, comme tiraillée entre deux plans de l'existence. Elle vous fixe de ses yeux morts et laiteux et vous adresse un sourire venimeux.{/n} « {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}{/g} ! Nous nous rencontrons enfin. Je commençais à me lasser d'attendre que vous vous décidiez à venir me rendre visite. » {n}Elle vous jauge du regard, et son ton moqueur cède la place au dégoût.{/n} « Des siècles de labeur acharné à me démener au service du bien commun, tout ça pour que le fruit de mon travail tombe entre les mains d'{mf|un|une} moins que rien. »

languages.text: {n}Theodora von Valancius önünde duruyor ve oldukça kötü gözüküyor. Göğsünde koca bir delik var, cildinin altından paslı kancalar fışkırıyor, boğazının tam ortasından da çirkin, şişmiş bir yara izi geçiyor. Sureti sanki bu gerçeklikten kopup geri geliyormuşçasına titreşiyor. Ceset gibi beyaz gözleriyle sana bakıp haince gülümsüyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}! Sonunda tanışabildik! Ziyaretime gelmeni beklerken sıkıntıdan patlayacaktım." {n}Seni ölçüp biçiyormuş gibi görünen "Theodora"nın alaycı tonu, memnuniyetsizliğe dönüşüyor.{/n} "Belli ki yüzyıllar süren özgecil emeklerim, çabalarım ve ardımda bıraktığım her şey; böyle önemsiz birine kalmış."
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora von Valancius is before you, and she looks grotesque: a hole yawns wide in her chest, rusted hooks protrude from beneath her skin, and a lumpen, inflamed scar cuts across her throat. The figure flickers, as though it is dropping in and out of this reality. She looks at you with the whitish eyes of a corpse and smiles venomously.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}! We meet at last! I had grown tired of waiting for you to pay me a visit." {n}"Theodora's" look is appraising, and her mocking tone turns to one of distaste.{/n} "Indeed, centuries of selfless toil and effort, and everything I left behind has gone to this nonentity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora von Valancius önünde duruyor ve oldukça kötü gözüküyor. Göğsünde koca bir delik var, cildinin altından paslı kancalar fışkırıyor ve çirkin, şişmiş bir yara boğazının tam ortasından geçiyor. Sureti sanki bu gerçeklikten kopup geri geliyormuşcasına titreşiyor. Ceset gibi beyaz gözleriyle sana bakıyor ve haince gülümsüyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}! Sonunda tanışabildik! Beni ziyaret etmeni beklerken sıkıntıdan patlayacaktım." {n}"Theodora" ölçüp biçiyormuş gibi gözüküyor ve alaycı konuşması, memnuniyetsiz bir hâle bürünüyor.{/n} "Belli ki yüzyıllar süren diğerkâm emeklerim, çabalarım ve ardımda bıraktığım her şey böyle önemsiz birine kalmış."
